channel.title: Underground on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Underground on Game6r

item.title: Metro 2033 game - Part 2
item.description: Metro 2033 2 game invites you to dive into exciting adventures. Here you will need to arm yourself with firearms and fight with opponents. Navigate underground locations and attack enemies on your way. Try not to let your character get hit. The scale of his health is located at the top.

item.title: Subway 3D game
item.description: There was a zombie apocalypse, and now the risen dead have filled the whole city. They also occupied the subway. It is here that you need to fight the zombies in order to clear the way to the shelter. Arm yourself with firearms, they are the most effective in the fight against the risen dead.
